results.title: Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature
results.text_hl: Plasma @CHEMICAL_Sterols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013261 @@@sterol@@@ analysis and exome sequencing confirmed the diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Lathosterolosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537880 @@@lathosterolosis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment resulted in lowering of plasma @CHEMICAL_lathosterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C001521 @@@lathosterol@@@ levels, improvement in transaminitis, and @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@ grade, suggesting that children with this condition should be actively treated in order to prevent progression of @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@liver disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Yaplito-Lee J, Pai G, Hardikar W, Hong KM, Pitt J, Marum J, Amor DJ. Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature JIMD Rep. 2020 Nov;56(1):14-19. PMID: 33204591
citations.BibTeX: @article{33204591, title={Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature}, author={Yaplito-Lee J and Pai G and Hardikar W and Hong KM and Pitt J and Marum J and Amor DJ}, journal={JIMD Rep}, volume={56}, number={1}, pages={14-19}}

results.title: Lathosterolosis: a disorder of cholesterol biosynthesis resembling smith-lemli-opitz syndrome.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Lathosterolosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537880 @@@Lathosterolosis@@@ is an @DISEASE_Cholesterol_pneumonia @DISEASE_MESH:C535937 @@@inborn error of cholesterol biosynthesis@@@ due to @<m>DISEASE_Lathosterolosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537880 @@@deficiency of the enzyme 3-beta-hydroxysteroid-delta-5-desaturase@@@ (or @GENE_SC5D @GENE_6309 @@@sterol-C5-desaturase@@@ or @GENE_SC5D @GENE_6309 @@@SC5D@@@).

citations.NLM: Ho AC, Fung CW, Siu TS, Ma OC, Lam CW, Tam S, Wong VC. Lathosterolosis: a disorder of cholesterol biosynthesis resembling smith-lemli-opitz syndrome. JIMD Rep. 2014;12():129-34. PMID: 24142275
citations.BibTeX: @article{24142275, title={Lathosterolosis: a disorder of cholesterol biosynthesis resembling smith-lemli-opitz syndrome.}, author={Ho AC and Fung CW and Siu TS and Ma OC and Lam CW and Tam S and Wong VC}, journal={JIMD Rep}, volume={12}, pages={129-34}}
